meta.title: Whisper Cheap - Free Local Speech-to-Text for Windows
meta.description: Type 10x faster by just talking. 100% local, no cloud, no subscriptions. Free speech recognition that runs entirely on your PC.
meta.keywords: speech to text, voice recognition, transcription, Windows, offline, local, free, STT, voice to text, dictation, productivity

hero.subtitle: Your voice becomes text instantly. Right where your cursor is. No cloud. No subscription. Just you and your computer.

demo.output: The meeting is tomorrow at 10am, please confirm attendance.

problem.title: The problem with typing
problem.description: You think at 150 words per minute. Your fingers max out at 40. By the time you finish typing, you've forgotten half your ideas.

whyThis.title: Why this exists
whyThis.reason1Desc: I tried them all. Inaccurate, slow, clunky interfaces. Not worth the frustration.
whyThis.reason2Desc: For something my CPU can do locally? That's $180/year for basic functionality.
whyThis.reason3Title: Cloud = your voice on someone's server
whyThis.reason3Desc: Every word you speak, uploaded and stored. Not for me.
whyThis.conclusion: So I built Whisper Cheap. It runs 100% on your PC. It's fast. It's accurate. And it's free because it costs me nothing to share.

local.title: 100% Local
local.desc: Your voice never leaves your computer. Works offline after download.

fast.title: Instant
fast.desc: Powered by Parakeet V3. Transcribes while you're still talking.

simple.title: One Shortcut
simple.desc: Press, speak, release. Text appears at your cursor. Works everywhere.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.step2Desc: A small indicator shows you're recording.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Right where your cursor was. Done.

founder.quote: I got tired of two things: expensive software for basic functionality, and free tools that were absolute garbage. The best part of talking vs typing? You don't lose context. When you write, by the time you finish one sentence, you've already forgotten the next three ideas. Speaking lets everything flow.
